name: Space Adventure - A Space Explorer
description:
A space shooter game based on old games. In this game you will adventure in other galaxies and planets, fight enemies and becoming stronger collecting points to upgrade your spaceship.

You can choose one of the three spaceships avaliable, each with unique playstyle and diferent caracterists, like flame shots, waves and chargeds shoots

Playable Spaceships:

  • Lightning - Fast and lot of damage
  • Dark Fire - Strong shot against big enemies and very resistant
  • Nocturne - Very balanced stats and a very useful shot

instructions:

Move: AWSD or Arrow Keys

Shoot:  Left Mouse Button or Left Controrl or Left Alt

Charger: Right Mouse Button
